dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT DISTINCT TO_CHAR(s.sail_date, 'fmMONTH DD, YYYY') depart_dt, TRIM(cv.voyage_name || ' ' || cvr.charter_voyage_refnum_value) voyage_vessel, cv.charter_voyage_xid, TRIM(TO_CHAR( (SELECT COUNT(sstopdd.s_ship_unit_gid) FROM shipment_stop_d sstopdd JOIN s_ship_unit sunit ON sstopdd.s_ship_unit_gid = sunit.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE sstopdd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sstopdd.stop_num = 1), '999,999,999')) || ' CONTAINERS' no_packs FROM job j INNER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj ON j.job_gid = jorj.job_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON jorj.order_release_gid = ssul.order_release_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON sessuj.s_equipment_gid = ssej.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON ssej.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND s.transport_mode_gid = 'VESSEL-CO' AND s.is_primary = 'Y' AND s.perspective = 'B' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sr ON s.shipment_gid = sr.shipment_gid AND sr.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage cv ON 'SCOULAR/NVO.' || sr.shipment_refnum_value = cv.charter_voyage_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN vessel v ON cv.vessel_gid = v.vessel_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_VOYAGE_NUMBER' WHERE j.job_gid = :JOB_ID

SELECT TRIM(TO_CHAR(ROUND(SUM(a.quant),0),'999999990')) quantity FROM (SELECT DISTINCT ssu.s_ship_unit_gid, TO_NUMBER(sref.refnum_value) quant FROM job j INNER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj ON j.job_gid = jorj.job_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON jorj.order_release_gid = ssul.order_release_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON sessuj.s_equipment_gid = ssej.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON ssej.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND s.transport_mode_gid = 'VESSEL-CO' AND s.is_primary = 'Y' AND s.perspective = 'B' INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssd ON s.shipment_gid = ssd.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum sref ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = sref.s_ship_unit_gid AND sref.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.CONTAINER_NET_WEIGHT' WHERE j.job_gid = :JOB_ID) a

SELECT LISTAGG(a.cont, ' ') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY a.cont) containers FROM (SELECT DISTINCT ssu.tag_1 || '/' || ssu.tag_3 cont FROM job j INNER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj ON j.job_gid = jorj.job_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON jorj.order_release_gid = ssul.order_release_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON sessuj.s_equipment_gid = ssej.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON ssej.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND s.transport_mode_gid = 'VESSEL-CO' AND s.is_primary = 'Y' AND s.perspective = 'B' INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssd ON s.shipment_gid = ssd.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE j.job_gid = :JOB_ID) a
